name: ContactPoint
title: ContactPoint
description: Details for all kinds of technology mediated contact points for a person or organization.

elements.name: ContactPoint
elements.description: Details for all kinds of technology mediated contact points.

elements.name: system
elements.description: phone | fax | email | pager | url | sms | other

elements.name: use
elements.description: home | work | temp | old | mobile - purpose of this contact point

elements.name: rank
elements.description: Specify preferred order of use (1 = highest)

elements.name: period
elements.description: Time period when the contact point was/is in use
